abstract: Ted Koppel has joined the roster of correspondents for the coming NBC newsmagazine "Rock Center With Brian Williams."
snippet: Ted Koppel has joined the roster of correspondents for the coming NBC newsmagazine "Rock Center With Brian Williams."

keywords.name: unknown
keywords.value: Rock Center With Brian Williams (TV Program)

lead_paragraph: NBC has added one of TV news's biggest names of the past, Ted Koppel, to the roster of correspondents for its coming prime-time newsmagazine, "Rock Center With Brian Williams."

headline.main: Koppel Joins NBC's 'Rock Center With Brian Williams'
